items.title: How To Build A Power-Team Of Volunteers

visible_instructors.name: Todd
visible_instructors.job_title: Author, Speaker, Life Advice-Giver, Career Coach
visible_instructors.title: Todd Stocker

items.headline: Your simple model for building and executing a powerful Volunteer Team; one that lets you work less and accomplish more.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will understand the importance of using teams to get things done.
You will also have a hands-on model to accomplish more in your Business, Community, School or Church.
You will have the tools you need to invite folks onto your team with basic job descriptions and purpose statements.

items.title: Theory of Constraint Innovation and Optimizing Outcomes
items.headline: Unlock value in your organization via The Theory of Constraints - the Management Skill of Business Process Management
objectives_summary: You will receive an additional MINDSET, and SET OF TOOLS of Constraint Innovation based on TOC.

Your thinking will be opened to answer one of the ultimate challenges for any manager.  How to achieve far more with we have.   More specifically, how to effectively manage critical resources in the face of uncertainty
To become a champion of change so as to assist your organization to get that much closer to its GOAL!  Using TOC terminology, the path to becoming a "Jonah".

items.headline: This course covers ethics for the officer or director of a business.
objectives_summary: Explore the duties and obligations of the officer or director.
Explore the meaning of ethics and ethical behavior in business.
Identify each of the various concepts setting forth ethical standards.
